column2: "Hey, my friend! I've heard rumors of your latest achivements. You appear to be leading a great summoner life."
"W-Wait, my friend, wait! It's not nice to ignore your friends. Friends are the most important aspect of life after all."
"Isn't that right Elizabeth? Don't you agree? Hahahahaha!"
"Oh, my friend, how rude of me. I haven't introduced you to her yet. She is my beloved Elizabeth. Cute, right?"
"1. You love more than one of them?"
"2. What happened to the one I saw before?"
"That's a foolish question, my friend. I love each and every one of them equally. How there are is not an issue."

"この前の……ああ、ジョセフィーヌのことかい？
あの子なら、今はリフレッシュ中さ！"

"適度な運動！\u3000適度なリフレッシュ！
そして全力の愛情！\u3000それこそがこの子達を
めいっぱい羽ばたかせるのに必要な要素なのさ！"
"My three beloved children - Catherine, Josephine, and Elizabeth."
"They are the remarkable pet types Summoners can currently utilize."
"Catherine is the quadrupedal type, Josephine is the aerial type, and Elizabeth is the bipedal type."
"It isn't just their appearances that differ. Different types have unique characteristics. That is what makes them so irresistibly cute and loveable."
"It's just not possible to choose one! That is why I love Catherine, and Josephine, as well as Elizabeth, equally so!"
"Ahaha, Elizabeth! I know, I know, you love me as well!"
"Oh, that's not good Elizabeth... you see, the human arm isn't supposed to bend that way! It's also rude to claw at someone's head! Hahaha!"
"Oh, look at the time - it's almost dinner! Let's go prepare, shall we, Elizabeth?"
"Hahaha, like I said before, I'm not food..."
